Detailed Description

This class is a specialised PropertyChange.

It represents a change to an array replacing a slice of values.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

const std::vector< PyObjectPtr > &  newValues,
const DataType &  type 
)

Constructor.

Parameters:
startIndex The index of the first value to change.
endIndex One greater than the index of the last value to change.
newValues The new values to add.
type The type of the new values.
